Articles.Content: While i was landing on mun One night i saw something glimmering on the surface, i though it was a glitch as mun does have those But as i got lower to the ground i found that it was 3D and an arch shape. Can anyone help me, pic Included. also i did Crash but i was too far away for it to be any of my landing gear.
It is a Mun arch, I have attached a picture of one up close.

There\'s a lot more where that came from:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=9585.0
Huh Thanks lol i\'ve been wondering about it for ages Do they do anything or just scenery?
Just one of the many easter egss Harvester likes to hide around; no functionality in any of them so far.
Ahh ok damn i thought it coulda been a stargate like thing lol
TELL ME THE LOCATION! I DEMAND IT!

TELL ME THE LOCATION! I DEMAND IT!

It\'s around the equator of the Mun, just get into a sub-20000m orbit and you should see it.

It\'s around the equator of the Mun, just get into a sub-20000m orbit and you should see it.

I set up a super low orbital satellite going around the Mun...I should be able to see it then. I\'ll look around a bit.

I explored this object and I am trying at the moment to figure out how to create a chain or rope I can use to pull on it, and see if there is a drawer in the surface of the Mun.

Or, perhaps, it could be an anchor for a space elevator.
Is there just the one arch or is there two? I can\'t recall..
You don\'t really need to be in a low orbit to see arches, here is a picture of one I could see from 100 km http://i.imgur.com/nHBnT.png
so... Challenge to see who can get there orbit so low that they fly under the arch? 8)

so... Challenge to see who can get there orbit so low that they fly under the arch? 8)

That challenge is already in progress/has been suggested. Good thinking though
